CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 28, 1959, pg. 1 reads: "Wins $6100 Car - Because her employer wrote her name on one of the tickets in a book, which the former purchased from the Pittsburgh Symphony Orchestra Women's Association, Mrs. John O. Helton, shown here with four of her five children, became the winner of a $6100 auto as first prize. Her children are: Eumira, 14, Cheryl, 7, Ricky, 9, and Gary, 4.  Vann, the oldest, was not present.  Story on Page 2.  -  Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. John O. Helton, seated with her children: Eumira, Ricky, Cheryl, and Gary, posed in Helton home, 6619 Apple Avenue, East Liberty
